llm_res.rule: approve: Allows _spender to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the _value amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with _value.
name function should return the name of the token - e.g. 'MyToken'.
decimals function should return the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
